column1: Smoque BBQ////Out of all of the restaurants I researched before coming to Chicago
column2: Smoque's stood at the top of the list for nearly every website I came across. Needless to say
column3: I don't think it was the BEST BBQ I've ever had in my life
column4: but it was definitely good. The line for this place can go out of the door during peak times so I would suggest getting there a little earlier. The cool thing about this place (and other places in Chicago) is that it's BYOB. Had I known that
column5: I would've gone to the liquor store to grab some drinks beforehand.
